mdRecord.dcterms:title: Topographical map of Petersburgh Dinwiddie Co., Va: from actual surveys and records / by F.W. Beers, C.E.
Topographical map of Petersburg, Dinwiddie Co., Va
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Beers, F. W. (Frederick W.) [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Southern and Southwestern Surveying and Publishing Company. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 map on 4 sheets : col. ; each image ca. 63 x 75 cm. on sheets 71 x 85 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: "J. P. Brown Manager. Offices: 2 Goddin Hall, Richmond, Va. and Concord, Va." [original]
"Entered according to Act of Congress in the year 1877 by F.W. Beers & Co. in the office of the Librarian of Congress at Washington, D.C." [original]
Shows street names and lots with buildings and names of indivdual property owners. [original]
